name: The Neighbor (PV Scylla)
description:
PREMISE:

You’ve finally moved into your new house, which should be the end of your worries, until you notice that your neighbor is acting odd. Every time you look over at their home, they’re often standing still. Sometimes they’re flat-out watching your house. That’s pretty creepy, but you have a buttload of work to do! Balance out the day app-testing and praying that your neighbor stays in one place.

FEATURES:

- 13.5k word count

- a neighbor that watches you

- a math minigame (no, seriously)

- your new house to explore

- multiple endings

NOTES:

This was a project I finished long ago, but kept trying to rewrite and redo because I kept thinking that I could do more with it. However, I've realized that the scope of what I wanted was just too big and I've decided to leave it the way it is. I admit that there are flaws, but I want to move on and work on different projects in the future, so this might be as far as I'll take this game, aside from bug fixes.
